forward
Class ForwardDbTableRow

java.lang.Object
  forward.ForwardDbTableRow

public class ForwardDbTableRow
extends java.lang.Object

ForwardDbTableRow This class allow to store and manage all elementary data base items achieved from a Sql table row. Each item is then described by an instance of ForwardDbItemValue. This class needs the descriptor of each column and the resultset, to get all data according to the type.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Giampietro Zedda
